titleStmt.title: Hereafter folowe x. certayne places of scrypture, by whome it is proued that the doctrynes and tradycyons of men ought to be auoyded
Bible. English. Selections. 1533.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted be [sic] me Robert Wyer dwellynge in saynt Martyns parysshe besyde Charynge Crosse,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: John Rylands University Library of Manchester.
